testcase.name: EDINET.EC8018W
testcase.description: EDINET.EC8018W: Context date values must match DEI date values as appropriate.

variation.name: invalid01
variation.description:
EndDateOfQuarterlyOrSemiAnnualPeriodOfNextFiscalYearDEI exists, but... CurrentQuarterInstant context instant value does not match EndDateOfQuarterlyOrSemiAnnualPeriodOfNextFiscalYearDEI, CurrentYTDDuration context endDate value does not match EndDateOfQuarterlyOrSemiAnnualPeriodOfNextFiscalYearDEI, InterimDuration context endDate value does not match EndDateOfQuarterlyOrSemiAnnualPeriodOfNextFiscalYearDEI, InterimInstant context instant value does not match EndDateOfQuarterlyOrSemiAnnualPeriodOfNextFiscalYearDEI, Prior1YearDuration context endDate value does not match CurrentFiscalYearEndDateDEI, Prior1YearInstant context instant value does not match CurrentFiscalYearEndDateDEI, Prior2YearDuration context endDate value does not match PreviousFiscalYearEndDateDEI, Prior2YearInstant context instant value does not match PreviousFiscalYearEndDateDEI
NextFiscalYearStartDateDEI exists, but... CurrentYTDDuration context startDate value does not match NextFiscalYearStartDateDEI, InterimDuration context startDate value does not match NextFiscalYearStartDateDEI, Prior1YearDuration context startDate value does not match CurrentFiscalYearStartDateDEI, Prior2YearDuration context startDate value does not match PreviousFiscalYearStartDateDEI

variation.name: invalid02
variation.description:
EndDateOfQuarterlyOrSemiAnnualPeriodOfNextFiscalYearDEI does not exist, but... CurrentQuarterInstant context instant value does not match CurrentPeriodEndDateDEI, CurrentYTDDuration context endDate value does not match CurrentPeriodEndDateDEI, InterimDuration context endDate value does not match CurrentPeriodEndDateDEI, InterimInstant context instant value does not match CurrentPeriodEndDateDEI, Prior1InterimDuration context endDate value does not match ComparativePeriodEndDateDEI, Prior1InterimInstant context instant value does not match ComparativePeriodEndDateDEI, Prior1QuarterInstant context instant value does not match ComparativePeriodEndDateDEI, Prior1YTDDuration context endDate value does not match ComparativePeriodEndDateDEI, Prior1YearDuration context endDate value does not match PreviousFiscalYearEndDateDEI, Prior1YearInstant context instant value does not match PreviousFiscalYearEndDateDEI, Prior2YearInstant context instant value does not match PreviousFiscalYearStartDateDEI adjusted by -1 day(s)
NextFiscalYearStartDateDEI does not exist, but... CurrentYTDDuration context startDate value does not match CurrentFiscalYearStartDateDEI, InterimDuration context startDate value does not match CurrentFiscalYearStartDateDEI, Prior1InterimDuration context startDate value does not match PreviousFiscalYearStartDateDEI, Prior1YTDDuration context startDate value does not match PreviousFiscalYearStartDateDEI, Prior1YearDuration context startDate value does not match PreviousFiscalYearStartDateDEI
Also... CurrentYearDuration context endDate value does not match CurrentFiscalYearEndDateDEI, CurrentYearDuration context startDate value does not match CurrentFiscalYearStartDateDEI, CurrentYearInstant context instant value does not match CurrentFiscalYearEndDateDEI
